statements: SELECT * FROM play_counts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT song_id, play_count FROM play_counts WHERE play_count > 10 ORDER BY play_count DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM play_counts
SELECT user_id, MAX(play_count) AS max_play_count FROM play_counts GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM play_counts ORDER BY last_played DESC
SELECT * FROM play_counts WHERE play_count > 100 ORDER BY last_played DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM play_counts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_songs > 5 ORDER BY total_songs DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, SUM(play_count) AS total_play_count FROM play_counts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_play_count > 500 ORDER BY total_play_count DESC
SELECT user_id, song_id, last_played FROM play_counts WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY last_played ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, MAX(play_count) AS max_play_count FROM play_counts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_play_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM play_counts;
SELECT track_id, plays FROM play_counts ORDER BY plays DESC;
SELECT track_id, SUM(plays) AS total_plays FROM play_counts GROUP BY track_id HAVING total_plays > 100;
SELECT user_id, track_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT track_id, plays FROM play_counts WHERE track_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM play_counts WHERE plays > 100 ORDER BY track_id DESC;
SELECT track_id, plays FROM play_counts WHERE plays < 50 ORDER BY plays ASC;
SELECT user_id, track_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT track_id, COUNT(*) AS total_plays FROM play_counts GROUP BY track_id HAVING total_plays > 50;
SELECT user_id, track_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id, track_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM play_counts LIMIT 10;
SELECT play_id, user_id, play_count FROM play_counts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT song_id, play_count FROM play_counts ORDER BY play_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, song_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id, song_id;
SELECT user_id, recommended_song_id FROM music_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM play_counts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY play_count DESC;
SELECT play_id, user_id, song_id FROM play_counts WHERE play_count > 10;
SELECT play_id, user_id, song_id, play_count FROM play_counts JOIN user_ratings ON play_counts.song_id = user_ratings.song_id WHERE user_ratings.rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs_played FROM play_counts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_songs_played > 20;
SELECT user_id, recommended_song_id FROM music_recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 AND recommended_song_id IN (SELECT song_id FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM play_counts
SELECT id, user_id, play_count FROM play_counts WHERE play_count > 10
SELECT title, artist FROM songs ORDER BY artist ASC, title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT u.username, s.title FROM users u JOIN songs s ON u.id = s.id
SELECT * FROM play_counts WHERE play_count > 10 ORDER BY play_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.title, pc.play_count FROM users u JOIN play_counts pc ON u.id = pc.user_id JOIN songs s ON s.id = pc.song_id ORDER BY pc.play_count DESC;
SELECT s.artist, COUNT(*) AS total_plays FROM songs s JOIN play_counts pc ON s.id = pc.song_id GROUP BY s.artist ORDER BY total_plays DESC;
SELECT u.username, AVG(ur.rating) AS avg_rating FROM users u JOIN user_ratings ur ON u.id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT s.title, s.artist, COUNT(*) AS total_ratings FROM songs s JOIN user_ratings ur ON s.id = ur.song_id GROUP BY s.title, s.artist ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT * FROM play_counts;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM songs;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, song_title, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM songs ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, song_title, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT r.user_id, r.song_id, r.recommendation_score, s.song_title FROM recommendations r JOIN songs s ON r.song_id = s.song_id;
